entry.title: WIND WARNING , Victoria
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:38 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 9.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Int'l Airport 07:25 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 9.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 9.0°C
Wind: SSE 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 70 gusting to 90 near Haro Strait this morning and early this afternoon. High 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending before morning then partly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 70 gusting to 90 near Juan de Fuca Strait. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the afternoon with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind west 30 km/h except gusting to 60 near Juan de Fuca Strait in the morning. Wind becoming light late in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022
